titles: A proclamation appointing all passes to ships to be granted hereafter by the High-admiral, his deputes, judges and officers
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet, at Edinburgh, the sixth day of May, one thousand six hundred and eighty years; and of Our Reign the thirty two year.
Signed: Will. Paterson, Cl. Sti. Concilij.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Maritime law --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
